content:
Hi, We are running a Zulip installation on AWS for few organizations, please is there a way to deploy our own notification bouncer service as well ? An just provide the URL as it's mentioned in the documentation https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/mobile-push-notifications.html#how-to-sign-up
Thank you

https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/mobile-push-notifications.html#sending-push-notifications-directly-from-your-server details what you would need to do to run your own push bouncer. It's not for the faint of heart -- I don't think we're aware of anyone who has done it.
This topic was moved here from #provision help > notification_bouncer by Alex Vandiver.
humm that's a strong advice there. I am more concerned about privacy than anything else
yeah.. only after asking the question tbh.... thank you
